properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item IM-1 for Azure Cosmos DB

features.featureName: Azure AD Authentication Required for Data Plane Access
features.featureDescription: Service supports using Azure AD authentication for data plane access.
features.featureGuidance: There is no current Microsoft guidance for this feature configuration. Please review and determine if your organization wants to configure this security feature.
features.customerActionsDescription: Use centralized identity and authentication system

features.featureName: Local Authentication Methods for Data Plane Access
features.featureDescription: Local authentications methods supported for data plane access, such as a local username and password.
features.featureGuidance: No additional configurations are required as this is enabled on a default deployment.
features.customerActionsDescription: Use centralized identity and authentication system

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Cosmos DB database accounts should have local authentication methods disabled
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Disabling local authentication methods improves security by ensuring that Cosmos DB database accounts exclusively require Azure Active Directory identities for authentication. Learn more at: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/how-to-setup-rbac#disable-local-auth.
